- [**Talk Suicide Canada**](https://talksuicide.ca) — 1‑833‑456‑4566, available nationwide.  
- [**Find a Helpline**](https://findahelpline.com), a global search tool that lists verified numbers by country.

If you ever feel unsafe or in danger, contact your local emergency services right away.
